title: Enhancing App Development Practical Skills: I-LEARN Model-Based Mathematical Information Literacy Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical knowledge and experience in internet-based information retrieval
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify reliable information sources required in the mathematical problem-solving process with 80% accuracy
Learners can evaluate the credibility of math-related information presented in VR simulations using a 3-tier checklist (authority, source, currency)
Learners can systematically organize math concept explanation materials by applying the 5-stage I-LEARN model process (Identify-Locate-Evaluate-Apply-Reflect-Navigate)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
